Name: AccountCurrencyCode
Notes: The currency of the Customer account.

Name: AccountDescriptiveName
Notes: The descriptive name of the Customer account.

Name: AccountTimeZone
Notes: Name of the timezone selected for the Customer account. For example: "(GMT-05:00) Eastern Time". This field does not reflect the current state of daylight saving time for the timezone.

Name: AdGroupId
Notes: The ID of the AdGroup.

Name: AdGroupName
Notes: The name of the AdGroup.

Name: AdGroupStatus
Enum Values:
UNKNOWN / unknown
ENABLED / enabled
PAUSED / paused
REMOVED / removed
Notes: Status of the ad group.

Name: CallDuration
Notes: The duration of the call, in seconds.

Name: CallEndTime
Notes: The end date and time of the call.

Name: CallerCountryCallingCode
Notes: Country code of the caller.

Name: CallerNationalDesignatedCode
Notes: Area code of the caller.

Name: CallStartTime
Notes: The start date and time of the call.

Name: CallStatus
Enum Values:
RECEIVED / Received
MISSED / Missed
UNKNOWN / unknown
Notes: The status of the call.

Name: CallTrackingDisplayLocation
Enum Values:
UNKNOWN / unknown
AD / Ad
LANDING_PAGE / Website
Notes: Location (e.g., ad or landing page) of the impression where the phone number was shown.

Name: CallType
Enum Values:
GOOGLE_SEARCH / Manually dialed
HIGH_END_MOBILE_SEARCH / Mobile click-to-call
UNKNOWN / unknown
Notes: The type of the call.

Name: CampaignId
Notes: The ID of the Campaign.

Name: CampaignName
Notes: The name of the Campaign.

Name: CampaignStatus
Enum Values:
UNKNOWN / unknown
ENABLED / enabled
PAUSED / paused
REMOVED / removed
Notes: The status of the Campaign.

Name: CustomerDescriptiveName
Notes: The descriptive name of the Customer.

Name: Date
Notes: The date formatted as yyyy-MM-dd.

Name: DayOfWeek
Enum Values:
MONDAY / Monday
TUESDAY / Tuesday
WEDNESDAY / Wednesday
THURSDAY / Thursday
FRIDAY / Friday
SATURDAY / Saturday
SUNDAY / Sunday
Notes: The name of the day of the week, e.g., "Monday".

Name: ExternalCustomerId
Notes: The Customer ID.

Name: HourOfDay
Notes: The hour of day as a number between 0 and 23, inclusive.

Name: Month
Notes: The first day of the month, formatted as yyyy-MM-dd.

Name: MonthOfYear
Enum Values:
JANUARY / January
FEBRUARY / February
MARCH / March
APRIL / April
MAY / May
JUNE / June
JULY / July
AUGUST / August
SEPTEMBER / September
OCTOBER / October
NOVEMBER / November
DECEMBER / December
Notes: The name of the month of the year, e.g., "December".

Name: Quarter
Notes: The first day of the quarter, formatted as yyyy-MM-dd. Uses the calendar year for quarters, e.g., the second quarter of 2014 starts on 2014-04-01.

Name: Week
Notes: The date for the Monday of the week, formatted as yyyy-MM-dd.

Name: Year
Notes: The year, formatted as yyyy.
